Text: Tobacconist:  In the USA, a tobacconist shop is traditionally represented by a wooden Indian positioned nearby.

<Text: Tobacconist:  Most retailers of tobacco sell other types of product; today supermarkets, in many countries with a special counter, are usually the main sellers of the common brands of cigarette.>

Text: Tobacconist:  In the United Kingdom, a common combination in small shops has been a newsagent selling newspapers and magazines, as well as confectionery and tobacco.
